pkgmetadata.longdescription: This was a package for PrestoSQL. The package itself is no longer maintained,as PrestoSQL got renamed to Trino. Read more athttps://trino.io/blog/2020/12/27/announcing-trino.htmlIf you are using an older PrestoSQL release, you can install a previousversion of the package with: pip install presto-client==0.302.0The package has been superseded with a client for Trino. You can install itwith: pip install trinoApologies for the disruption and very short notice, resulting in no transitionperiod.
